::Autofire::

Autofire nods, working the controls so that the pod would swoop down, 
landing about 100 feet away from Astroblast and the base. The top 
opens and Autofire hops out, the various weaponry on his body all 
ready to fire.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron does not change his expression on his face, it is still 
serious,
> and deadly. But inside his mind he is very suprised, and even 
happy. He
> recognized Astrotrain (Astroblast) and Speedbreaker. What were they 
doing
> here? "No" he says turning to Autofire. "Let us land, I need to see 
them
> one on one".
